EmailTemplate.subject: Calendriers/agendas 2019-2020 toujours disponibles
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Meilleure gestion de votre temps Il n’est pas trop tard pour vous procurer des calendriers et agendas 2019 - 2020 <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?ReturnUrl=%2fEN%2fsearch%2fpages%2fcategory%2f2020-Calendars-Planners%2f_%2fN-agh%3fcmp%3dEBFGTIMEMANAGEMENT19FR]]> Magasiner par style. Planificateurs Magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/FR/search/pages/browse/Planificateurs/_/N-e7r?cmp=LPTMORGALLFR]]> Organisateur Magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?ReturnUrl=%2fEN%2fsearch%2fpages%2fbrowse%2fOrganizers%2f_%2fN-e19%3fcmp%3dEBFGTIMEMANAGEMENT19FR]]> Calendrier Magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/FR/search/pages/browse/Calendriers/_/N-e7q?cmp=LPTMCALALLFR&cmp=EBFGTIMEMANAGEMENT19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> E60PD-190SFB/001/PD Date d’expiration : 30 septembre 2020 Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov]]>
